tasks.label: Git Commit All
tasks.detail: Commits all changed and added files with a default commit message.

tasks.label: Run Catch2 Tests and Log Failures
tasks.command: ./path/to/your/test/executable --reporter compact | tee test_results.log && grep -c 'failed' test_results.log | xargs -I {} echo "$(git rev-parse --short HEAD): {}" > failed_tests_count.log
tasks.detail: Runs all Catch2 tests, logs the output, and counts the number of failed tests along with the latest Git commit hash.

tasks.label: Commit and Run Tests
dependsOn: Run Catch2 Tests and Log Failures
tasks.detail: Runs the 'Git Commit All' task followed by the 'Run Catch2 Tests and Log Failures' task.
